import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaUsers, FaShieldAlt, FaClock, FaStar, FaGraduationCap, FaTools } from 'react-icons/fa'; const About = () => { const stats = [ { number: '500+', label: 'Happy Students', icon: }, { number: '50+', label: 'Equipment Items', icon: }, { number: '24/7', label: 'Support', icon: }, { number: '4.9', label: 'Rating', icon: }, ]; const values = [ { icon: , title: 'Quality & Safety', description: 'All equipment is thoroughly inspected and sanitized before each rental to ensure your safety and satisfaction.' }, { icon: , title: 'Convenience', description: 'Easy online booking system with flexible rental periods to fit your academic schedule.' }, { icon: , title: 'Student-Focused', description: 'Designed specifically for students with affordable pricing and campus-friendly policies.' }, { icon: , title: 'Excellence', description: 'Committed to providing the best rental experience with premium equipment and excellent service.' } ]; const team = [ { name: 'Dr. Sarah Johnson', role: 'Founder & CEO', description: 'Former engineering professor with 15+ years of academic experience.', image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/150x150?text=SJ' }, { name: 'Michael Chen', role: 'Operations Manager', description: 'Expert in logistics and student services with a passion for innovation.', image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/150x150?text=MC' }, { name: 'Emily Rodriguez', role: 'Customer Success', description: 'Dedicated to ensuring every student has a seamless rental experience.', image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/150x150?text=ER' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

About Campus Connect

We're revolutionizing how students access academic equipment. Our mission is to make quality tools and supplies accessible to every student, promoting learning and innovation.

{/* Mission Section */}

Our Mission

Campus Connect was born from a simple observation: students often struggle to access the equipment they need for their studies. Whether it's a mini drafter for engineering drawings or a lab apron for chemistry experiments, we believe every student should have access to quality tools without the burden of ownership.

We're committed to building a sustainable, student-friendly platform that not only provides access to equipment but also promotes responsible resource sharing and environmental consciousness.

Explore Our Collection
